paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on variants in the KCNH2 gene, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Arrhythmia; Long QT syndrome 2; Congenital long QT syndrome

individual_records.phenotype_details: Arrhythmia; Long QT syndrome 2; Congenital long QT syndrome
individual_records.evidence_sentence: KCNH2 variant c.1280G>A was identified in a patient with arrhythmia.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with long QT syndrome, affecting cardiac repolarization.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is noted in ClinVar as likely pathogenic.
key_quotes: KCNH2 variant c.1280G>A was identified in a patient with arrhythmia.

tables_processed.table_caption: Missense and high confidence (HC) loss-of-function (LoF) variants identified in KOVA 2 that are pathogenic or likely pathogenic in ClinVar but not found in gnomAD.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text and tables.
